entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: bogus translation error (DbSet<JsonEntityBasic>()' could not be translated) when projecting a subquery starting from another DbSet #34352
  • Cosmos: incorrect result when projecting out-of-bounds element of an owned collection #34351
  • Cosmos: Expression of type 'List`1[JsonOwnedLeaf]' cannot be used for parameter of type 'IQueryable`1[JsonOwnedLeaf]' for queries with complex projection of multiple owned collections and elements #34350
  • Cosmos: KeyNotFoundException for queries doing SelectMany on owned collection #34349
  • Cosmos: "Bind property on structural type coming out of scalar subquery" for some complex-ish projection queries #34348
  • Consider changing the default handling of parameterized collections back to constantization (or inline collection of parameters) #34347
    Backlog
  • Translate parameterized collections to inline collections of parameters, with optional bucketization #34346
    Backlog
  • Enable EF.Parameter for forcing parameterization of collection parameters #34345
    9.0.0
  • Introduce context options to control constantization/parameterization of parameterized collections #34344
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Have you considered supporting DuckDB? #34336

PullRequests

Updated

  • Remove migration lock timeout #34338
  • Change default embedded discriminator property from "Discriminator" to "$type" #34340
  • Don't implement IModelFinalizingConvention on CosmosJsonIdConvention #34343
